bibl.title: Papyri Bodleianae I.

series.title: Studia Amstelodamensia ad epigraphicam ius antiquum et papyrologicam pertinentia.

bibl.note: P. Bodl. I, 1-171. - Part I: Texts. - A. Biblical and Theological Texts (1-6). - B. School Text (7). - C. Documents of the Ptolemaic, Roman and Byzantine Periods (8-53). - Part II: Descripta (54-171). - Catalogue. - Indexes.
bibl.seg: SALOMONS R.P., Papyri Bodleianae I. (Studia Amstelodamensia ad Epigraphicam, Ius antiquum et Papyrologicam pertinentia. XXXIV.)
Amsterdam, J.C. Gieben, 1996, 4Â°, xxi-398 pp. et 73 pll. ISBN 90-5063-035-9. Hfl. 340.

P. Bodl. I, 1-171. - Part I: Texts. - A. Biblical and Theological Texts (1-6). - B. School Text (7). - C. Documents of the Ptolemaic, Roman and Byzantine Periods (8-53). - Part II: Descripta (54-171). - Catalogue. - Indexes.

C.R. par Colin Adams, CR N.S., 49 (1999) pp. 237-239. - Alain Martin, ChrEg 74 (1999) No. 147, pp. 171-172. - Orsolina Montevecchi, Aegyptus 76 (1996) pp. 192-195. - Marie Drew-Bear, BibO 57 (2000) coll. 609-611 (observations sur des toponymes du nome Hermopolite). - Paul Heilporn, AntCl 70 (2001) pp. 427-428. - Fritz Mitthof, Gnomon 75 (2003) pp. 420-425.
